name: DIG - Save the trees!
description:
Exhausted of fighting with humans, Aliens found a more efficient way to take over our world: through trees. They discovered that everything is connected through roots and mycelium so they started taking over underground. The world's destiny was compromised, until Moleshroom showed up. A radioactive mole mushroom friend who's decided to use his claws against those annoying aliens. Play as Moleshroom in DIG, search for the aliens through the different roots underground and help save the world! 

Credits:

Art Design and Visual Effects by Federico Rodríguez, Ianara Lagorio, Valeria Sarro, Andrés Francia and Emiliano Botti

Programming by Andrés Francia, Matías García  and Emiliano Botti

Music & Sound by Valeria Sarro
